Package adventure_game

Class Character

java.lang.Object
adventure_game.Character
Direct Known Subclasses:
NPC, Player
public abstract class Character extends Object
The abstract class Character represents a generic character in the game. It defines properties such as health, mana, base damage, and other attributes such as being vulnerable or invincible for certain periods of time. The class also includes methods for attacking, defending, using items, and modifying health. Any subclass of Character must implement the abstract method takeTurn() which determines how the character behaves in combat.

    • Character

      public Character(String name, int health, int mana, int damage)
      Creates a new character with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the character.
      health - The initial and maximum health of the character.
      mana - The initial and maximum mana of the character.
      damage - The base damage of the character.

    • attack

      public void attack(Character other)
      Method that allows the character to attack another character. It takes another Character object as a parameter and deals damage to the target based on the character's base damage and a random modifier. The method also takes into account whether the target is invincible or vulnerable at the time of the attack.
      Parameters:
      other - is enemy the player is attacking.

    • defend

      public void defend(Character other)
      Method that allows the character to defend against an attack. It gives the character a chance to become invincible for the next turn or become vulnerable for the next turn.
      Parameters:
      other - is enemy attack the player is defending against.

    • modifyHealth

      public void modifyHealth(int modifier)
      Method that modifies the health of the character. It takes an integer modifier as a parameter and adjusts the character's health by that amount. If the resulting health is less than 0, it is set to 0. If the resulting health is greater than the character's max health, it is set to the max health.
      Parameters:
      modifier - is the amount to modify health by.

    • setAsVulnerable

      public void setAsVulnerable(int numTurns)
      Set the number of turns that the character is vulnerable.
      Parameters:
      numTurns - the number of turns that the character is vulnerable.

    • isVulnerable

      public boolean isVulnerable()
      Check whether the character is currently vulnerable.
      Returns:
      true if the character is vulnerable; false otherwise.

    • setTempDamageBuff

      public void setTempDamageBuff(double buff)
      Set the temporary damage buffer. This is a multiplicative factor which will modify the damage for the next attack made by this Character. After the next attack, it will get reset back to 1.0
      Parameters:
      buff - the multiplicative factor for the next attack's damage.

    • setDamage

      public void setDamage(double modDamage)
      Set the temporary damage buffer. This is a multiplicative factor which will modify the damage for the next attack made by this Character. After the next attack, it will get reset back to 1.0
      Parameters:
      modDamage - the multiplicative factor for the next attack's damage.

    • obtain

      public void obtain(Consumable item)
      Adds the specified Consumable item to this character's inventory.
      Parameters:
      item - the item to be added to the character's inventory.

    • useItem

      public void useItem(Character owner, Character other, Scanner scanner)
      Allow the character to use an item from their inventory. The method prompts the user to select an item from the character's inventory and uses the item on either the owner or another target character. The used item is removed from the inventory after use.
      Parameters:
      owner - The character using the item.
      other - The target character that the item will affect.
      scanner - A scanner to collect user input.

    • hasItems

      public boolean hasItems()
      Checks if the character has any consumable items.
      Returns:
      true if the character has any items, false otherwise.

    • castSpell

      public void castSpell(Character other)
      Allow the player to cast a spell on the opponent. The method reduces the player's mana by 3 and halves the health of the opponent. If the opponent's health is already at 1, the spell does nothing.
      Parameters:
      other - the character to cast the spell on.

    • getMana

      public int getMana()
      Get the current mana of this Character
      Returns:
      the current mana of this Character

    • setMana

      public void setMana(int Tmana)
      Modify and set the player's mana by the given modifier. Check if mana is less than 0 set to 0. Check if mana is more than max and set to max.
      Parameters:
      Tmana - the amount to modify the player's mana by.

    • chargeUpMana

      public void chargeUpMana()
      Increase the player's mana by 1.
